message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I think I can offer $105 for the product.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. How about $110?
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $112.50, but that's as low as I can go.
